Add Claude Code configuration and learning notes with hypothesis validation framework

- Update 00_analysis_summary_report.md with hypothesis validation status and streamlined structure
- Remove redundant "limitations" section, consolidate conclusions

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
